mapper.insert: insert into tbl_car ( car_id, car_no, car_kind, car_alias, car_year, member_id, car_file_name, car_file_path ) values ( #{carId}, #{carNo}, #{carKind}, #{carAlias}, #{carYear}, #{memberId}, #{carFileName}, #{carFilePath} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_car where member_id = #{_parameter}

select car_id as carId, car_no as carNo, car_kind as carKind, car_alias as carAlias, car_year as carYear, member_id as memberId, car_file_name as carFileName, car_file_path as carFilePath from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY car_id) rnum, a.* from ( select car_id, car_no, car_kind, car_alias, car_year, member_id, car_file_name, car_file_path from tbl_car where member_id = #{memberId} ) a ) a where a.rnum between #{pageInfo.start} and #{pageInfo.end}
select car_id as carId, car_no as carNo, car_kind as carKind, car_alias as carAlias, car_year as carYear from tbl_car where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_broken_file ( broken_file_no, car_id, broken_file_name, broken_file_path ) values ( #{brokenFileNo}, #{carId}, #{brokenFileName}, #{brokenFilePath} )

insert into tbl_estimate ( estimate_id, car_id, repair_cost, estimate_date, broken_file_min, broken_file_max ) values ( nextval('seq_estimate'), #{carId}, #{repairCost}, now(), #{brokenFileMin}, #{brokenFileMax} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_estimate where car_id in (select car_id from tbl_car where member_id = #{_parameter})

select rnum, estimate_id as estimateId, car_id as carId, (select car_no from tbl_car z where z.car_id = a.car_id) carNo, (select car_alias from tbl_car z where z.car_id = a.car_id) carAlias, repair_cost as repairCost, TO_CHAR(estimate_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as estimateDate, broken_file_min as brokenFileMin, broken_file_max as brokenFileMax from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY estimate_id) rnum, a.* from ( select estimate_id, car_id, repair_cost, estimate_date, broken_file_min, broken_file_max from tbl_estimate where car_id in (select car_id from tbl_car where member_id = #{memberId}) ) a ) a where a.rnum between #{pageInfo.start} and #{pageInfo.end}

select broken_file_no as brokenFileNo, car_id as carId, broken_file_name as brokenFileName, broken_file_path as brokenFilePath from tbl_broken_file where car_id = #{carId} and broken_file_no between #{brokenFileMin} and #{brokenFileMax}
